function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through close contact and droplet secretions","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 among medical staff","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures and personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV-C disinfection","People":"Medical staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Pathogen contamination in the hospital environment","Impact":"Healthcare-associated infections","Mitigation":"Enhanced environmental hygiene protocols, regular disinfection","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surfaces, automated disinfection systems","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on hospital surfaces","Impact":"Risk of environmental transmission within hospital premises","Mitigation":"Frequent surface monitoring, targeted disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Surface swab testing, electrostatic sprayers","People":"Hospital staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Environmental services department, infection control team"}]}
